mapper.sql: id, goods_no,name, subject_id, price, status, cover_img_url, synopsis, detail_img_url, detail, creator, create_time, editor, edit_time, is_full, is_batch, batch_max, is_loan
mapper.select: SELECT cla.teach_mode_code AS teachModeCode, cla.teach_mode_name AS teachModeName, cla.id AS classId, cla.`name` AS className, cla.start_date AS classStartDate, cla.class_time AS classTime, cla.campus_id AS campusId, cam.`name` AS campusName, cam.address AS campusAddress FROM enrol_class cla LEFT JOIN enrol_campus cam ON cla.campus_id=cam.id WHERE cla.`status`=1 AND cam.`status`=1 AND cla.id in ( SELECT class_id FROM enrol_goods_class WHERE goods_id =#{goodsId} );

SELECT goods.id, goods.goods_no AS goodsNo, goods.name, goods.subject_id AS subjectId, goods.price, goods.status, goods.synopsis, goods.is_full AS isFull, goods.is_batch AS isBatch, goods.batch_max AS batchMax, goods.is_loan AS isLoan, goods.cover_img_url AS coverImg, goods.detail_img_url AS detailImg, goods.detail, SUM(cla.current) AS currentNum, goods.is_free AS isFree, goods.is_other_expense AS isOtherExpense, goods.other_expense AS otherExpense, goods.other_expense_remark AS otherExpenseRemark, cla.campus_id AS campusId, cla.class_type_code AS classTypeCode, cla.teach_mode_code AS teachModeCode, cla.start_date AS startDate
FROM enrol_goods goods,enrol_class cla,enrol_goods_class gc
WHERE goods.subject_id=#{subjectId} AND gc.goods_id=goods.id AND gc.class_id=cla.id AND goods.status=1 GROUP BY goods.id

SELECT goods.id, goods.goods_no AS goodsNo, goods.name, goods.subject_id AS subjectId, goods.price, goods.status, goods.synopsis, goods.is_full AS isFull, goods.is_batch AS isBatch, goods.batch_max AS batchMax, goods.is_loan AS isLoan, goods.cover_img_url AS coverImg, goods.detail_img_url AS detailImg, goods.detail, SUM(cla.current) AS currentNum, goods.is_free AS isFree, goods.is_other_expense AS isOtherExpense, goods.other_expense AS otherExpense, goods.other_expense_remark AS otherExpenseRemark
FROM enrol_goods goods,enrol_class cla,enrol_goods_class gc
WHERE goods.id=#{goodsId} AND gc.goods_id=goods.id AND gc.class_id=cla.id
